user.title: AIL: Aziende Industriali di Lugano
user.description: Enter your credentials for AIL EnergyBuddy. You can find your account details at [{login_url}]({login_url}). If you don't have an account, you can create one at [{account_create_url}]({account_create_url}).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your username and password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
